# PED::GET_PED_DECORATION_ZONE_FROM_HASHES

## Summary
Same as GET_PED_DECORATION_ZONE but with hashes

## Parameters
* **INT** collectionNameHash: Hash of the name of the collection where the preset lives
* **INT** presetNameHash: Hash of the name of the preset

## Returns
* **PED_DECORATION_ZONE**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns the zoneID for the overlay if it is a member of collection.
enum ePedDecorationZone
{
	ZONE_TORSO = 0,
	ZONE_HEAD = 1,
	ZONE_LEFT_ARM = 2,
	ZONE_RIGHT_ARM = 3,
	ZONE_LEFT_LEG = 4,
	ZONE_RIGHT_LEG = 5,
	ZONE_MEDALS = 6,
	ZONE_INVALID = 7
};

Full list of ped overlays / decorations by DurtyFree: https://github.com/DurtyFree/gta-v-data-dumps/blob/master/pedOverlayCollections.json
